official_title: To provide for the protection and preservation of certain rare paleontological resources on the former Union Chapel Mine site in Alabama, and for other purposes.
short_title: Union Chapel Fossil Footprint Site Preservation Act

summary.text: Union Chapel Fossil Footprint Site Preservation Act - Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) preserve and protect the paleontological resources located within the exterior boundaries of the former Union Chapel Mine site (Alabama); (2) provide opportunities for scientific research in a manner compatible with preservation and protection of such resources; and (3) provide the public with opportunities for educational activities in a manner compatible with such preservation and protection.

titles.title: Union Chapel Fossil Footprint Site Preservation Act
To provide for the protection and preservation of certain rare paleontological resources on the former Union Chapel Mine site in Alabama, and for other purposes.
